name: Barnabe goes to Bed, Bath, and Beyond
name_original: Barnabe goes to Bed, Bath, and Beyond
description:
Barnabe goes to Bed, Bath, and Beyond is an adventure game developed by CallofDuckies. It came out on 10-07-2020.
Barnabe goes to Bed, Bath, and Beyond is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
